```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library('tidyverse') ; library('modeldata') ; library('ggplot2')
library('jsonlite')
library('rgdal')
library('sf')
library('extrafont')
library('ggplot2')
library('ggspatial')
library('patchwork')
library('scico')
library('vapoRwave')
library('dplyr')
```


```{r load data, include = FALSE}
vac_base <- read.csv("Vaccination-Base - Sheet1.csv", row.names=NULL)
```


```{r map, include = FALSE}
state_capitals <- fromJSON("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/vega/vega/master/docs/data/us-state-capitals.json")
state_capitals_sf <- st_as_sf(state_capitals, coords = c("lon", "lat"), crs = 4326)
usa_1 <- ggplot(data = vac_base) + geom_sf()
```
